arts.sum: Watford were cruelly denied an impressive 2-1 away win against promotion hopefuls Sunderland on Saturday by a late Dennis Cirkin goal. Tom Cleverley's men have taken just one point from their previous...

arts.ttl: EFL and Sky Sports have just given Daniel Farke another irritating Leeds United headache
arts.sum: The EFL have confirmed this week that Leeds’ long trip down to the South Coast to take on Portsmouth in March has been moved for broadcast. Leeds United fans have consistently given their thoughts on the ever-changing fixture schedule and the contempt for match-going fans that goes with it, and the upcoming Portsmouth fixture is more proof of their point.

arts.ttl: Leeds warned “very creative, intelligent player” could be a “risk signing”
arts.sum: Leeds United are reportedly keen on signing the Krasnodar attacking midfielder Eduard Spertsyan. According to a report from Football Insider, Leeds are keeping close on the Armenian International, who has scored six goals and provided three assists in all competitions this season. They need to add more creativity and depth to their attacking unit, and […] The post Leeds warned “very creative, intelligent player” could be a “risk signing” appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Leeds United’s Manor Solomon might have just given a very strong transfer hint for the summer
arts.sum: Leeds United winger Manor Solomon is arguably in the best and most consistent form of his career in England right now, and has his eyes firmly fixed on returning to the Premier League. Manor Solomon discusses Premier League ambition during Leeds United hot streak

arts.ttl: Leeds United get new Premier League promotion twist after Sheffield United clash
arts.sum: Leeds United's quest for promotion to the Premier League became much clearer this weekend despite not playing a Championship fixture. Leeds are top of the Championship table and earned a five-point lead thanks to their win over Coventry City in midweek.

arts.ttl: Millwall keeper ‘sensational’ as penalty save tops of performance in FA Cup win at Leeds United
arts.sum: The last game he played as well, away at Portsmouth, he was excellent. Alex Neil hailed stand-in goalkeeper Liam Roberts’ “sensational” display in the wake of Millwall’s 2-0 win over Leeds in the FA Cup today.
Leeds United and Millwall condemn "tragedy chanting" that took place during Saturday's FA Cup tie between the two clubs at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke admission about Leeds line-up speaks volumes as duo grab attention
arts.sum: Even Farke admitted after full-time that the number of changes to his side disrupted the rhythm of the team and was not about to point the finger at anybody because of this. Daniel Farke was very diplomatic after full-time, outlining his disappointment while exuding the feeling that the cup exit was not the end of the world.

arts.ttl: Farke says health comes before football as tragedy chanting in Millwall loss
arts.sum: Daniel Farke spoke of football's values after Leeds condemned "vile" tragedy chanting by Millwall fans during their side's 2-0 FA Cup fourth-round victory at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: 'Entirely unacceptable' - Millwall 'appalled' by tragedy chanting heard in Leeds United clash - Leeds Live
arts.sum: Millwall have issued a strongly-worded statement in relation to allegations of tragedy chanting during their FA Cup win at Leeds United this afternoon. "The club strongly condemns all forms of football tragedy abuse and is appalled to receive reports of such chanting from a minority at today's Emirates FA Cup fixture against Leeds United.
